header.title: THE STUDIO
header.body:
A PRIVATE SPACE DESIGNED TO WELCOME YOU IN THE BEST CONDITIONS.

Every corner of the studio was built by hand - each piece was imagined, created, and customized by us



AT STARLETTE, WE'VE CHOSEN THE MICRO DELUXE TO bring you the most MODERN, chic, AND EFFECTIVE VERSION OF THE largee METHOD - TECHNOLOGY serving your wellness.



HIGH-QUALITY classes, guided with care and attention to every detail.



GRIP SOCKS ARE AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE AT THE STUDIO.



ENJOY A CHANGING ROOM WITH SHOWERS AND Fresh TOWELS, then relax in our cozy lounge - over a coffee, tea, or MATCHA.



A warm ATMOSPHERE, CURATED MUSIC, AND uplifting ENERGY.

All of this was built TO HELP YOU FOCUS ON WHAT's ESSENTIAL: YOU.
